name: Garlic Roasted Broccoli with Parmesan Cheese
author: Dietz & Watson
summary: Broccoli is roasted with garlic and olive oil, then tossed with lemon juice and shaved parmesan cheese.
ingredients: 1 head broccoli, washed and cut into bite-sized pieces
4 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil, divided
½ teaspoon coarse ground black pepper
¼ cup Dietz & Watson Shaved Parmesan Cheese
directions: Preheat your oven to 425 degrees F
Wash the broccoli and cut it into bite-sized pieces
Place the broccoli on a large rimmed baking sheet
Mince the garlic and toss it in with the broccoli
Drizzle 3 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil over the broccoli, then season with coarse black pepper and kosher salt
Bake in the oven for 20-25 minutes until the broccoli is tender
Toss in lemon juice, parmesan cheese, and 1 tablespoon olive oil; serve immediately
